definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Recruited by Polish generals for their speed, and ferocity , Polish archers are armed with a bow and a sword.
sentences.chinese: 由於他們作戰驍勇，來去如風，被波蘭將領招至軍中。

sentences.english: There are some who are impatient, has a bad temper and just want to finish the war fast.
sentences.chinese: 有些將領性格暴躁，沒有忍耐性，只是一心追求速戰。

sentences.english: Zeng Guoquan was the younger brother of Zeng Guofan who was very famous general of the Xiang Army.
sentences.chinese: 曾國荃是曾國藩的胞弟，著名湘軍將領。

sentences.english: It is certainly turning its leading position to advantage now.
sentences.chinese: 百度當前無疑在將領先地位轉化爲優勢。

sentences.english: General Iland said that the use of force was the only way to stop the flotilla.
sentences.chinese: 愛朗將領說，阻止船隊前進的唯一方法就是使用武力。

sentences.english: Less than a year later the general was in charge.
sentences.chinese: 不到一年，這位將領便控制了印尼的局勢。

sentences.english: The statues of former navy generals stand rock-firm, silently observing Weihai's tremendous changes.
sentences.chinese: 海軍將領的雕像昂然屹立，靜觀着威海的滄桑鉅變。

sentences.english: Q. What happens to a commander card after the corresponding commander is captured?
sentences.chinese: 當相應的將領被俘虜後將領卡發生什麼變化？

sentences.english: Q. What happens to a commander card after the corresponding commander is captured?
sentences.chinese: 當相應的將領被俘虜後將領卡發生什麼變化？

sentences.english: Waterloo is a battle of the first order, won by a captain of the second.
sentences.chinese: 滑鐵盧是一場頭等戰爭，卻被一個次等的將領勝了去。

sentences.english: When the four-star died, he was lauded as a great warrior.
sentences.chinese: 這位四星將領去世後被譽爲是一個偉大的戰士。

sentences.english: Let action be the leadre of life.
Youngly willing get is tiny hesitant, later on crustily the rind of head receive orders city.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的將領微微猶豫，隨後硬着頭皮領命下城。

sentences.english: The bellman will show you the way to the Grand Ballroom.
sentences.chinese: 行李員將領您去國際宴會廳。

sentences.english: Athor was previously a general in what is now South Sudan's army, the SPLA.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑟是現在稱爲南蘇丹部隊的前任將領。

sentences.english: French generals and senior officers are resisting.
sentences.chinese: 法國將領和高級官員在抵制。

definition: Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
